mapper.insert: INSERT INTO psp_order (oid, orderNo, sid, sellerJson, uid, label, content, pid, status, stage, createTime, isAllot, updateTime) VALUES (#{oid}, #{orderNo}, #{sid}, #{sellerJson}, #{uid}, #{label}, #{content}, #{pid}, #{status}, #{stage}, now(), #{isAllot}, now());

INSERT INTO psp_order_contract (oid, contractNo, partyA, partyB, contractUrl, signTime, startTime, endTime, createTime, service, money, payment, parymentWay) VALUES (#{oid}, #{contractNo}, #{partyA}, #{partyB}, #{contractUrl}, #{signTime}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, now(), #{service}, #{money}, #{payment}, #{parymentWay});
